website_summaries.verdict: This product offers a healthy dose of EPA and DHA without a bunch of fillers or unhealthy ingredients.
pros: 1,000 mg of krill oil per serving
Compact, smooth capsules that are easy to swallow and won't leave you with fish burps
Comes in an easily resealable pouch
cons: There have been a few complaints of the capsules leaking in the bottle

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: Sharper and fishier taste than other krill oil. One of the capsules had exploded in the bag. All the capsules were very brittle, perhaps from age and heat. Of 4 times I've ordered krill oil from bulksupplements , the last two (300 and 100 pills) were rancid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F. F.

customer_reviews.title: Do nut purchase if you are seeking a krill oil without a strong fish smell.
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a “ NO STAR” selection. When I opened the the gel claps package there was a STRONG fish smell and the inside was oily and the gel caps were covered in the oil. I removed several but quickly replaced them due to the smell. I have been taking krill oil manufactured by a different company which has no fish smell but decided to try this in an effort to reduce cost. BIG MISTAKE!!! I am pleased Amazon will refund my money when they receive the product back.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for leakage
customer_reviews.text: WTH?? I’ve purchased from this company before with no issues. Once I opened the package, I understood what the low ratings were about. I had some serious leaking and I had to wipe each capsule down with a paper towel. A picture of the silica gel packet will give you an idea of what the inside of the bag looked like. I will never order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Capsules!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe there are any 5 star reviews on these bags of pure garbage. When I opened the bag, as many others have said, there was a strong fish smell. I never had this odor with the bottled krill oil capsules I buy at Costco. I always lay out my evening medications on a folded kleenex on the counter so I won't forget them. I would estimate that at least 50% of the time, the "krill oil" capsules leaked out onto the tissue. Do not waste your money. Evidently, the people that rated these 5 stars must have been extremely lucky to receive an exceptional bag that had no leaky capsules.
customer_reviews.author: Losalfans

customer_reviews.title: Great for your eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I take krill oil mainly for my eyes and have tried many brands over the years and this is the best of the krill oil supplement I've had to date! The beefy coating seems like it would even make it past the stomach for better absorption, unlike all the other brands I've tried but one. Krill oil from Dr. Mercola has this feature, but it was a bit beyond my budget. Krill oil is great for your eyes and your heart so I'm gonna be reordering this...
customer_reviews.author: Celtenator

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: When you take a pill to lubricate your eyes, it's pretty easy to know when something is of lower quality. While taking these, my eyes would burn more than when they were dry. A feat impressively pathetic. The bag is nice to use as a pack to take to work, though.
customer_reviews.author: livegolf

customer_reviews.title: Rancid. Fishy. No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Seems rancid. Super smelly. Rancid oils are not healthy, a waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: The Real Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great product - affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a good price. Indistinguishable from the same product offered by more expensive sellers, Bulk Supplements offers high quality supplements at affordable prices. I recommend them. I have ordered Bulksupplements krill oil in the past and will order again in the future. It is the best deal on high quality krill oil available. I have used othe Bulksupplements products as well and have always been satisfied with the price, quality and service.
customer_reviews.author: r_gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is cost effective and great for our health. I wish the larger packages were still available as my husband and I both take several a day. I was given this as a sample to try, but have purchased two more since then. I highly recommend them as great quality and a great price. Overall, we like the company and will continue to purchase from them.
customer_reviews.author: Holly G. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Beware the heat
customer_reviews.text: I like or feel I should take krill oil for health reasons. But! Do not order during the summer. Mine came in a little melted. I put them into refrigerator then cleaned them with paper towel. Now they also smell. I usually don't order ANY capsules during the summer. I'll try them later, maybe!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Seems great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The other krill oil I have bought are much more expensive and these seem to be the same quality. Only difference is this one has a fishy smell which is not a big deal to me at all. I've learned from different sources that krill oil in general are great for maintaining overall health.
customer_reviews.author: Tsogtsaikhan Gendenpel

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is excellent and the quality is exceptional
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks of use, I have noticed a considerable difference in the appearance of my skin. It is appreciably shinier than before using the krill oil from Bulk Supplements. I have also noticed less inflammation in my joints post-workout. The packaging is excellent and the quality is exceptional. I would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Krill oil inside package... Twice... Not good
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking krill oil from bulk supplements for quite awhile. I switched brands once and had a bad experience with the packaging. A punctured capsule broke inside the bag and made the whole batch bad. This has now happened to me on the last two orders of this product. Maybe it is an Amazon storage handling issue, but I cannot purchase this product in the bulk envelope packaging any longer which is unfortunate. Nothing worse than opening up a package to have a strong fish smell and realize it is all over your fingers and all of the capsules inside. Notice all the oil dots from moving the capsules on the paper towel after emptying the package.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Received a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These Omega 3 Krill Oil capsules are a good value for the money. I compared them to other brands of the same amount and potency. I was happy with the quality of the capsules. There is a slight fishy odor, but if I swallow one of these with food before taking the capsule, and also afterward, that seems to eliminate the problem. I'm taking them (twice a day) to improve joint health and skin. Have only been taking them a short time, so it's too soon to see results.
customer_reviews.author: NeMoonlite

customer_reviews.title: Neutral
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps this item would be odorless and tasteless, but my bag arrived with one of the capsules broken open. The whole bag smelled like fish and tasted like fish. On the upside, no fishy burps after ingesting.
customer_reviews.author: T Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Krill
customer_reviews.text: This is a decently sized Krill oil pill, it serves my purposes. It does SMELL but you have to understand that there isn't too bad of a fishy taste. Just opening the bag will catch you a little off guard. I am thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy I Norton

customer_reviews.title: Good price, and no fish odor or taste
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking big box brand fish oil for years. Those gave a fishy aftertaste; and sometimes capsules would smell nauseatingly terrible. I recently read an article about the advantages of Krill Oil over regular fish oil; so I decided to give krill oil a shot. The BulkSupplements Brand was a reasonable price. I only take 500 mg per day (versus 1000 mg of fish oil), and I don't get any "fish burps" or any fishy aftertaste. Krill oil is supposed to be much better absorbed than fish oil; so you can take less of it. I bought the smallest size from BulkSupplements to test it out, and I'm pleased. I'll be buying their larger size next go round.
customer_reviews.author: The Chadd

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging & no returns
customer_reviews.text: This came in a soft pouch, and had some broken gel caps inside, causing the entire bag to smell like fish. And of course, every gel cap is now coated in krill oil and is almost unbearable to swallow. I was unable to receive any kind of return or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For A Reasonable Cost
customer_reviews.text: These softgels are a great product and all for less than the brand we used to use. We are on our second order and will continue using the BulkSupplements brand. Their anti-inflammatory effect has truly helped my husband feel better in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica0238

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: There was a "fishy" smell when I opened the bag, but I wasn't expecting it to smell like peaches and cream. Otherwise, pretty good quality. I know that because I didn't have any of those nasty fishy tasting burps I've had with other fish oil supplements in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There may have been more oil on the outside than inside.
customer_reviews.text: Poor manufacturing quality. If they can't keep the oil in the capsule what else can they not do during the manufacturing process? Save your money and buy a product you can trust. After all you are putting this inside your body!
customer_reviews.author: William M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Seem to do the job
customer_reviews.text: Like others, the gel caps are very firm, and when mine arrived at least one had cracked in the foil pack and left oil on the outside of many of the intact ones. Smells quite strongly, so I left them in the zip top foil pouch. No burping or indigestion, but cam occasionally smell it in urine, so I imagine it's getting where it need to go. Would prefer a hard sided packaging (or even a stiff insert in the packet to keep them from being crushed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sassanella

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the advantages of BulkSuppliments Krill oil which is ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the advantages of BulkSuppliments Krill oil which is that; on my fixed income the supplements are economical and I have come to trust the quality of your products. The advantage of me using Krill oil is that it includes more components than traditional fish oil Your products are most beneficial to me because I prefer to blend my suppliments, as opposed to purchasing multiple vitamins. I am very happy with the availability of the choices you offer as well.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this product because it is the best value on the market! Plus there's no fishy aftertaste or burps.

customer_reviews.text: With the last bag I bought, the oil was leaking all over the inside. Don't think I will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: No doubt about it ive found the one!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love bulk supplements. The krill oil gel capsules are easy to swallow there if no after taste or smell. The package is very durable and they arrived in a very timely manner. I have found my supplier for all my supplemental needs.

I took this product with good results lasting for 3 months....thank you!

We ordered the smaller size previously as a "test," and then just ordered the larger size. Shipping, service, and product were excellent.

I also have to give these to my dog & the size is perfect (small enough) for him to swallow without any trouble. I would definitely recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Bulk Supplements Continue to Impress
customer_reviews.text: Bulk supplements never disappoints and they don't here either. There was a slight delay in shipment on Amazon's side, so I received the pills later than expected. Because of the heat wave in the Northeast area, some of the pills were slightly damaged. If you don't know, krill oil can smell if they break open and the smell lingers on your fingers for a while. However, with Bulk Supplements it was not overpowering and the product can still be used. Even with this situation, they never let me down. Their products go down easily, do not cause any gastrointestinal issues, and are 100% pure and free of fillers or non-natural ingredients. They are my favorite supplement!

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Krill is the real king-of-the-sea as far as Human health goes.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who takes omega 3s, should really look at Krill oil, and because krill-oil supplements supply the healthful omega-3 fatty acids DHA and EPA. But the difference is Krill oil comes from small crustaceans, not fatty fish, and contains more EPA and DHA, Long-chain omega-3 fatty acids (EPA eicosapentaenoic acid) and DHA (docosahexaenoic acid). Better for human bio health. And Krill oil contains Astaxanthin (pronounced "asta-ZAN-thin") a naturally-occurring carotenoid found in algae, shrimp, lobster, crab and salmon. Carotenoids are pigment colors that occur in nature and support good health. Beta carotene, for example, is orange, and Krill is red.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Fetter

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just improve packaging or shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good overall product, shipping and or handling methods could improve a bit on these though. Have multiple products from bulksupplements, I like that and will continue to use them. Just hope this low star rating will get their attention like others had stated. Can see 1 pil that broke open and leaked in the bag covering all the pills in oil. Also very strong odor, I have a bad septum and can hardly smell anything but this came thru crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: HIGH QUALITY BEST VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this product. I thoroughly research any supplements that I take, this is the best value for the price. The krill oil softgels are oily and a bit smelly but that is to be expected. No fishy after taste or burps. My husband started purchasing all his supplements from this brand,
customer_reviews.author: Renee Richter

customer_reviews.title: I give this to my elderly mom. She could ...
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my elderly mom. She could not tolerate statin drugs for her cholesterol which ran slightly over 300. She takes 1 per day with breakfast. Note, she weighs less than 100 lbs. This brought her levels down to 140. She also doesn't eat meat.
customer_reviews.author: momc

customer_reviews.title: Saved $$ going bulk
customer_reviews.text: I really like the packaging, small easy to store bulk bag. Good directions come with the supplements. And what they are used for. Second time I took these I did burp, yuk! But next day I did not so hopping that continues. Just been taking a week so far and all good. I took 100mg before so was not sure with the 500. Thought it would be healthier having a larger dose. I like the larger pack quantity hate ordering every 30-60 days.
customer_reviews.author: cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Hold your nose!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not too sure, opened the package and the smell just about knocked me over. My prior Krill capsules from a different vendor did not smell like dead fish. I really hope they do not cause "fish burps". Edit after a few days of use. No fishy reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Kage

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: They are packaged in a pouch, they came damaged, some of the gel pills popped inside and destroyed the whole thing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MeeptheSheep
